ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Lakecya Smith [SMTP:widdowsson@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 7:10 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Doctrine of Wizardry

From: Lakecya Smith <widdowsson@...>

Lute Lewis wrote:

> This Boggles the mind for me, why would verant want to penalize you for intelligent use of spells? I mean why should you attack a monster when they can attack you back when all you have to do is fly. Many monster may still attack you flying or nay. Gnolls for example have boys often enough. That sort of pro monster trend Verant has is sort of puzzling.

[]

[] I was thinking more of sitting out somewhere where the critter can't/won't get you. Like levitating over water and blasting at something that won't go in the water. That's the grey area I think.

Trev
